TObjectHelper Class Helper

Summary

Extends TObject for easier RTTI use.

Namespace: DUnitX.Utils
Syntax
Delphi
type
 TObjectHelper = class helper for TObject
 end;
Methods
 NameDescription
GetField(string)

Returns the field with the given name; nil if nothing is found.

GetFields

Returns a list of all fields of the object.

GetMember(string)

Returns the member with the given name; nil if nothing is found.

GetMethod(Pointer)

Overloaded. Returns the method at the given code address; nil if nothing is found.

GetMethod(string)

Overloaded. Returns the method with the given name; nil if nothing is found.

GetMethods

Returns a list of all methods of the object.

GetProperties

Returns a list of all properties of the object.

GetProperty(string)

Returns the property with the given name; nil if nothing is found.

GetType

Returns the type of the object; nil if nothing is found.

HasField(string)

Returns if the object contains a field with the given name.

HasMethod(string)

Returns if the object contains a method with the given name.

HasProperty(string)

Returns if the object contains a property with the given name.

TryGetField(string,TRttiField)

Retrieves the method with the given name and returns if this was successful.

TryGetMember(string,TRttiMember)

 

TryGetMethod(Pointer,TRttiMethod)

Overloaded. Retrieves the method with the given code address and returns if this was successful.

TryGetMethod(string,TRttiMethod)

Overloaded. Retrieves the method with the given name and returns if this was successful.

TryGetProperty(string,TRttiProperty)

Retrieves the property with the given name and returns if this was successful.

TryGetType(TRttiType)

Retrieves the type of the object and returns if this was successful.
